DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Inserting gene create laboratory person 's white blood cell may make body build immune response kill cancer cell . PURPOSE : Phase I trial study effectiveness gene therapy treat patient cancer respond previous therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Gene Therapy Treating Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine safety maximum tolerate dose T cell activate vitro modify chimeric anti-CEA immunoglobulin T cell receptor ( Ig TCR ) patient CEA express adenocarcinoma . - Determine pharmacokinetics regimen persistence modify T cell blood patient . - Evaluate immunogenicity murine sequence chimeric anti-CEA Ig TCR . - Assess immunologic parameter correlate efficacy regimen patient . - Evaluate , preliminary manner , efficacy regimen patient CEA bearing tumor . OUTLINE : This dose escalation study . Peripheral blood lymphocyte ( PBL ) harvest . PBL activate vitro modify recombinant chimeric anti-CEA immunoglobulin T cell receptor ( Ig TCR ) . Ig TCR modify T cell reinfused 30-60 minute . The estimated maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) define dose 2 6 patient experience unacceptable toxicity . If MTD reach within first cohort , second cohort 3 patient receive 4 dos modify T cell higher dose . Patients follow every 2 week 2 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 6-9 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically prove CEA express adenocarcinoma Serum CEA level great 10 ng/mL Failed standard therapy Measurable disease PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : 02 Life expectancy : Greater 2 month Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : No significant hepatic disease Bilirubin great 3 mg/dL No active clinical disease cause hepatitis B Renal : No significant renal disease Creatinine great 3 mg/dL Cardiovascular : No significant cardiovascular disease Pulmonary : No significant pulmonary disease Other : Not pregnant Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception No significant endocrine , rheumatologic , allergic disease No active clinical disease cause cytomegalovirus tuberculosis HIV negative PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : At least 4 week since prior chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : At least 4 week since prior radiotherapy Surgery : Not specify
